message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested but $120 is a bit high for me.  How about $85?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $120 is a bit high for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $105.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $95. What do you think?
I understand that $105 was still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit more and offer it to you for $100. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $100 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable paying. I'm willing to go up to $97. This is my final offer.
I understand that $100 was still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $98. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
